name: Buransk
description:
Created for the opengameart.org fall game jam 2018.

In a world where no ever turns out their lights, federation satellites and cruisers reign terror down upon terra. Only you, in the all new Buransk space defense vehicle,  can destroy the heinous technology which holds our citizens in fear,

Match the speed of your enemy and maintain line-of-sight before blasting them to shreds! Or just zip around the earth at impossible velocities!

i made this in about 1.5 days so it's a little raw.

Made with Unity. Built for Windows 7-10.
